dsense.name: ingredient
dsense.guideword: often plural (food: part of recipe) (食品)

example.eg: Read through the recipe and see if we have all the ingredients.
example.egtrans: 通读一下菜谱，看看我们是不是原料齐全。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 食材，配菜，原料, 调料，佐料

example.eg: Your business plan seems to have all the ingredients for success.
example.egtrans: 你的商业计划似乎成分齐全，可以成功。

example.eg: If the active ingredient in a cleanser is toxic, I won't buy it.
